items.title: Reeling from Trump's tariffs, India and China seek a business reboot
items.description: India's prime minister hopes to draw nearer to some of the worldâ€™s largest economies.

items.title: Thousands demonstrate across Mexico for the 130,000 missing
items.description: Thousands march through Mexico's cities urging more government action against enforced disappearances - a problem often linked to drug cartels.

items.title: As beer sales fall, young Germans develop taste for alcohol-free lager
items.description: Non-alcoholic sales have more than doubled in recent years, even though Germany's wider beer market has slumped.

items.title: French voice fears over Bayeux Tapestry move to UK
items.description: The precious medieval work is to be displayed in London next year - but the French art world is strongly opposed.

items.title: Life inside notorious 'Alligator Alcatraz'  in its final days
items.description: Family members of detainees say their loved ones disappeared into the notorious immigration detention facility.
